lead_paragraph: Tribune Company have filed competing proposals to reorganize the newspaper publisher and bring it out of bankruptcy, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Tribune Company creditors -- three groups of them -- filed competing proposals to reorganize the newspaper publisher and bring it out of bankruptcy, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Tribune Creditors File Competing Restructuring Plans

abstract: Tribune Company creditors -- three groups of them -- filed competing proposals to reorganize the newspaper publisher and bring it out of bankruptcy, Bloomberg News reported.
